== Ubuntu Contribution ==
=== Local Community ===

* Collaboration in the InstallFest made in 2008 and 2010 on FM Radio La Tribu
* Participation in UbuntuDay event at Globant offices in Buenos Aires in 2009
* Collaboration in the Latin American free software install fest 2010 (Flisol) in Gonzalez Catan (Instituto Blas Pascal 24/04/2010)
* Gave the talk “I have installed Ubuntu and… What about now?” in EPUEL (Meeting for a free education) on 10/09/2010 with Guillermo Lisi. Here you could see a <nowiki>[[https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/-mlB_NHPoqUQ/TpOheDononI/AAAAAAAAADk/MDoBv6hl-yI/s600/Epuel2010.jpg|picture giving the lecture]]</nowiki>
* Talk on the basic level in multimedia in the Computing and Technology Conference at Escuela Técnica 36 D.E. 15 (17/09/2010)
* At the conference UbuCon2010 Argentina (http://ubucon.org.ar/2010) I was an exhibitor at the talks 
** "High Availability on virtual machines with KVM" with Juan Manuel Zele (19/11/2010)
** "Tools for the sysadmin at the company" with Pippo Martin (20/11/2010) 
* Collaboration in the Latin American free software install fest 2011 (Flisol) in Carapachay (Escuela de Oficios San Cayetano 09/04/2011)
* Participation in the panel discussion on computer topics in the Computing and Technology Conference at Escuela Técnica 36 D.E. 15 (02/09/2011) With Juan Manuel Zele y Felipe Llerena (<nowiki>[[http://zele.biz/?p=730#more-730 | Blog de z37a]]</nowiki>)
* Atention Ubuntu stand and contributor to the InstallFest held in the Framework of the <nowiki>[[http://www.cisl.org.ar/|Free Software International Conference]]</nowiki> from 08/09/2011 to 09/09/2011 at National Library
* Colaboration in the InstallFest made in the <nowiki>[[https://wiki.mozilla.org/SFD2011_Buenos_Aires|Software Freedom Day in Buenos Aires]]</nowiki> on 24/09/2011
* Organized the Oneiric Ocelot Release Party in Buenos Aires
* Ubuntu Forums mod since October 20th 2011 (ARG LoCoTeam subforum)
* Ubuntu Member since October 21th 2011
